column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////This restaurant was AMAZING! We came here after getting a few recommendations from people. We got there and they said the wait was about 20-30 minutes
column2: so we put our name down and were called in about 10 mins. The service staff was super nice
column3: very polite and even with the long list of people waiting
column4: we never felt rushed! I ordered a custom omelette and added the specialty berry pancakes on the side. The pancakes were AMAZING. I'm not usually a pancake girl
column5: but these were super delicious! You get a lot of food for your money (we each spent under $15). My friend ordered an Eggs Benedict and she LOVED it. I would absolutely recommend this place and would most definitely come back! =D =D
